title: Chains to Feet Converter (survey & engineer’s chain)

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: feet = chains × chain_length For surveyor’s chain: feet = chains × 66 For engineer’s chain: feet = chains × 100

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: chains = feet ÷ chain_length Survey: chains = feet ÷ 66 Engineer’s: chains = feet ÷ 100
